resources.string: RiseupVPN is an easy, fast and secure VPN service from riseup.net. RiseupVPN does not require an user account, keep logs or track you in any way. This service is paid for entirely by donations from users like you. Please donate at https://riseup.net/vpn/donate.

By using this application you agree to the Terms of Service available at https://riseup.net/tos. This service is provided as-is, without any warranty and is intended for people who work to make the world a better place.
